hero.name: VOLDEMORT
hero.specialAbility: At the start of your turn, if Nagini is still alive, you may draw 1 card. If Nagini is destroyed at any point in the game, Voldemort immediately loses 2 HP.

cards.title: FEINT
cards.immediateText: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.

cards.title: REGROUP
cards.afterText: Draw 1 card. If you won the combat, draw 2 cards instead.

cards.title: DASH
cards.afterText: Move your fighter up to 3 spaces.

cards.title: CRUCIO
cards.afterText: If you won the combat, look at 2 cards from the opposing fighter's hand and discard 1.

cards.title: IMPERIO
cards.basicText: Select an opposing fighter Voldemort can attack to be "CURSED". You may move the CURSED fighter up to 4 spaces and then attack any opposing fighter in range of the CURSED fighter once, using a random eligible ATTACK or VERSATILE card from the CURSED opponent's hand. This attack may be defended. If the CURSED opponent's hand has no eligible cards, the CURSED fighter takes 2 damage instead.

cards.title: AVADA KEDAVRA
cards.afterText: If you do not defeat an opposing fighter with this card, Voldemort loses 8 HP.

cards.title: REGENERATION: BONE OF THE FATHER
cards.basicText: Voldemort recovers 2 HP. Voldemort also recovers 2 HP for each additional REGENERATION card in your discard pile.

cards.title: REGENERATION: FLESH OF THE SERVANT
cards.basicText: Voldemort recovers 2 HP. Voldemort also recovers 2 HP for each additional REGENERATION card in your discard pile.

cards.title: REGENERATION: BLOOD OF THE ENEMY
cards.basicText: Voldemort recovers 2 HP. Voldemort also recovers 2 HP for each additional REGENERATION card in your discard pile.

cards.title: VENOMOUS BITE
cards.afterText: If you won the combat, deal 2 additional damage to the opposing fighter.

cards.title: DARK MAGIC
cards.afterText: You may shift any existing damage between Voldemort and Nagini. Any damage shifted between Voldemort and Nagini cannot result in either having more than their maximum health or less than their minimum health.
